title: SS E-Commerce Platform
tech: Next.js - TypeScript - Express.js - Prisma - PostgreSQL - Redis - Socket.IO
desc: A modern full-stack e-commerce platform featuring user authentication, product management, real-time chat, analytics dashboard, payment processing with Stripe, and WebRTC video calls. Built with Docker for seamless deployment. Learn more >

gallery.title: Homepage
gallery.description: Modern landing page with hero section and product showcase

gallery.title: Admin Dashboard
gallery.description: Comprehensive overview with analytics and key metrics

gallery.title: Analytics Dashboard
gallery.description: Interactive charts and data visualization for business insights

gallery.title: Products Management
gallery.description: CRUD operations for product catalog and inventory

gallery.title: Product Detail Page
gallery.description: Detailed product view with variants and add to cart functionality

gallery.title: Shopping Cart
gallery.description: Interactive cart with quantity management and checkout flow

gallery.title: Payment Integration
gallery.description: Stripe payment processing with secure checkout

gallery.title: Order Management
gallery.description: Order history and status tracking for customers

gallery.title: Order Tracking
gallery.description: Real-time shipment tracking with status updates

features: User authentication with social login (Google, Facebook, Twitter, Apple)
Real-time chat and video calls with Socket.IO and WebRTC
Advanced analytics dashboard with interactive charts
techHighlights: Redis for caching and session management

title: Variant-Based Inventory Management
desc: An advanced inventory management system with variant-based product organization, attribute management, and real-time stock tracking. Features dynamic filtering and comprehensive admin controls. Learn more >

gallery.title: Inventory Dashboard
gallery.description: Main dashboard showing stock levels, alerts, and inventory overview

gallery.title: Attributes Management
gallery.description: Dynamic attribute system for managing product variants and properties

features: Variant-based product management (size, color, material combinations)
Dynamic attribute system with dependent dropdowns
Real-time inventory tracking and stock alerts
techHighlights: Complex relational database design with Prisma

title: Real-Time Chat Application
desc: A comprehensive real-time communication platform featuring instant messaging, video calls, and customer support integration. Built as part of the e-commerce ecosystem with seamless user experience. Learn more >

gallery.title: User Chat Interface
gallery.description: Clean and intuitive chat interface for customer communication

gallery.title: Admin Chat Dashboard
gallery.description: Administrative interface for managing customer support conversations

features: Call controls (mute, camera toggle, screen share)
techHighlights: Custom React hooks for call management

title: Donor Management System
tech: React - Node.js - Express.js - MongoDB - Redux Toolkit - i18next
desc: A comprehensive web-based system for managing donors, their donations, and related activities. Designed for charity organizations to streamline donor records, track contributions, manage communication, and generate reports. Includes multilingual support and responsive design for data entry volunteers across devices.

gallery.title: Landing Page
gallery.description: Modern landing page with overview of system features and quick access to main functions

gallery.title: Donors Management
gallery.description: Complete donor database with search, filter, and bulk operations for efficient management

gallery.title: Add New Donor
gallery.description: Intuitive form for adding new donors with validation and auto-save functionality

gallery.title: New Donation
gallery.description: Streamlined donation entry form with donor selection and payment tracking

gallery.title: Phone Calls Management
gallery.description: Call tracking system for donor outreach and communication history

gallery.title: Favorite Locations
gallery.description: Geographic tracking of donor locations and donation hotspots

gallery.title: Emergency Contacts
gallery.description: Quick access to emergency donor contacts and urgent communication tools

features: Comprehensive donor profile management with detailed information
Advanced donation tracking by amount, date, type, and frequency
Real-time search and filtering across all donor data
Phone call management and communication history tracking
Geographic location tracking and favorite locations management
Emergency contact system for urgent donor outreach
Responsive design optimized for desktop, tablet, and mobile devices
Bulk import/export donor data via CSV with validation
Activity logs and audit trails for all operations
Dashboard analytics with donor statistics and trends
Offline-first support using Progressive Web App features
techHighlights: State management with Redux Toolkit for complex data flows
RESTful API with Express.js and MongoDB aggregation
Advanced filtering and search with MongoDB queries
Responsive UI built with Tailwind CSS and modern design patterns
Optimistic updates for smooth user experience
Pagination and server-side filtering for performance
